response.overview: A struggling actor named Johny gets lucky smoking Captain's magical space weed but his luck turns bad when a bad guy named Hollywood takes it all away... in THC - Surround Sound.
response.tagline: Johny and Gina, two strangers become best friends through their love for magical space weed but for Johny it's a gateway into the darker world of a guy named "Hollywood" and he needs to be rescued by his friend Gina.
response.title: POTHOLES
